#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int dp[1002][1002]; 
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int m,n,k;
		scanf("%d %d %d", &m, &n, &k);
		m++;
		n++;
		dp[0][1] = 1;
		for(int i = 1; i <= m; i++)
			for(int j = 1; j <= n; j++)
				dp[i][j] = (dp[i][j-1] + dp[i-1][j])%k;		
		printf("%d\n", dp[m][n]);
	}
}
